ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained and 1/2 liquid reserved
1 (8 ounce) package dry corn bread mix

cookingTips: Mix all ingredients gently with a spatula rather than vigorous stirring to keep the cornbread light and tender
Reserve the liquid from canned corn to control the moisture level; use half as directed for the right texture
Bake at 375°F for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out with just a few moist crumbs
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This casserole is comfort food at its best. Would you like to add jalapeños for heat or corn kernels for extra texture?
